game.name: Hazard Us
game.categories: Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Tracked Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Can you and your friends survive this VR puzzle adventure? You'll have to think fast, communicate well and dodge traps to solve your way to victory! Keep your eyes peeled, your brains engaged and your upper lips stiff! This world is Hazard Us!
